description: disassociate_address does not return the appropriate EC2 response when disassociating an unassociated address. Despite this seeming failure, EC2 will respond success. EC2 will return as such: aabbccdd-0146-4952-bdbe-710e4fee8387 true yet, when the EC2 api encounters this scenario, it responds with a 400: ERROR:boto:400 Bad Request ERROR:boto: InvalidInstanceID.NotFoundInstance None could not be found.req-7a9b4d03-b9f5-4243-95d8-f1ccab180631 The EC2 api should evaluate whether it receives an instance_id from: instance_id = self.network_api.get_instance_id_by_floating_address(context, public_ip) and, if so, then continue attempting to disassociate. Else, bail out early and return successfully.
title: disassociate_address on unassociated address does not return proper EC2 response

Else, bail out early and return successfully.

comments.content: Reviewed: https://review.openstack.org/46185 Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/ab55af8ed5afd0765a23a85d608d4b6d35bdd166 Submitter: Jenkins Branch: master commit ab55af8ed5afd0765a23a85d608d4b6d35bdd166 Author: Craig Tracey Date: Wed Sep 11 23:37:10 2013 -0400 disassociate_address response should match ec2 The current behavior of disassociate_address does not match that of what EC2 would return when calling it upon an unassociated address. In EC2 when disassociate_address is called on an unassociated address, it returns successfully as such: aabbccdd-0146-4952-bdbe-710e4fee8387 true However, when this same called is made against the OpenStack EC2 implementation, this would return a 400: InvalidInstanceID.NotFound Instance None could not be found. req-7a9b4d03-b9f5-4243-95d8-f1ccab180631 This is due to the fact that we continue to attempt disassociation despite instance_id == None. Modify this behavior to match EC2 by simply checking that instance_id is set before continuing disassociation. Else, bail early, and in either case report success. This change also modifies unit tests to account for this change. Change-Id: I17c822d70918fefa55da2ab096af5b98b87e23e7 Closes-Bug: #1224251
